products.name: Magical Night-lite
products.description: This one of a kind magical night-lite will not only illuminates your room, but gives you magical dreams that you'll remember forever.

products.name: Never ending glass of Water
products.description: Tired of running out of water when you sleep? This glass of water is always half-full. And it always stays clean and germ free!

products.name: Reusable Tissues
products.description: Every good beside has a box of tissues. Never run out with reusable tissues. A must for all sleepers with allergies.
